poem:
Title: Fragmented Democracy

Broken pot of politics,
upon America's stove,
Simmering chaos stew -

Old men, their words blurred,
one, dictator's promise harsh,
one, memories jumbled.

How to choose, America?
Within your vast, hopeful heart,
quiet truth remains.
